name: Goddess of the Sea Felted Cuff
description:
A wet felted cuff that shimmers like the waves. 

I use a medium brown natural merino wool for the base of this cuff. For the colour I use a turquoise merino wool, periwinkle blue merino wool, or hand dyed "greens" merino wool. With this I combine multicoloured blue merino silk blend, white soy silk fibre, and a bit of peacock shimmer to give it sparkle. The button is a tarnished brass shell shaped piece, perfectly in place.  The button and button hole are handstitched with a thread that matches the theme of the cuff.

This cuff is perfectly cozy on a chilly day, and perfectly cool on a warm one. The wool is not itchy and is surprisingly soft.

You are purchasing a custom made cuff, so what you recieve will be unique and may not be exactly the same as what you see here. 

Sizing is as follows:

Small - wrist circumference from 3.5 - 5.5 inches
Medium - wrist circumference from 5.5 - 6.5 inches
Large - wrist circumference 6.5 - 7.5 inches
X-Large - wrist circumference - 7.5 + inches

The photo shown depicts the "periwinkle blue" option, you may contact me for an example of the other colour options. If you have any other questions or would like to create a custom piece, please contact me at andrea@energeticlove.ca

name: Ponder Pandora Felted Cuff
description:
A cuff that marries earthy green with vibrant blue, with a sparkle and shine in between. It reminds me of the rain forest, with its glittering streams and giant green leaves. 

The base of this cuff is a soft and supple medium brown natural merino wool. The top colouring is done in periwinkle blue merino wool and moss green merino wool, with accents of white soy silk and peacock shimmer fibre. The button is an earthy and rain forest inspired leaf. Button and button hole have been hand stitched with vibrant blue thread and some good old fashioned 
love.

This cuff is perfectly cozy on a chilly day, and perfectly cool on a warm one. The wool is not itchy and is surprisingly soft.

You are purchasing a custom made cuff, so some variation in what you see here may occur. The fun is that you get something entirely unique!

Sizing is as follows:

Small - wrist circumference from 3.5 - 5.5 inches
Medium - wrist circumference from 5.5 - 6.5 inches
Large - wrist circumference 6.5 - 7.5 inches
X-Large - wrist circumference - 7.5 + inches

If you would like any more information, please feel free to contact me by email at andrea@energeticlove.ca

name: Abundant Heart Felted Cuff
description:
This cuff is full of love and warmth, and will make you feel just that! 

The base of this cuff is a soft and supple medium brown natural merino wool. The top colouring is done in red merino wool and a red/pink silk merino wool blend, with a white soy silk fibre accent. The button is made from clay, stamped with a plaid pattern and glazed in a deep red/pink colour. Button and button hole have been hand stitched with brown thread and some good old fashioned 
love.

This cuff is perfectly cozy on a chilly day, and perfectly cool on a warm one. The wool is not itchy and is surprisingly soft.

You are purchasing a custom made cuff, so some variation in what you see here may occur. The fun is that you get something entirely unique!

Sizing is as follows:

Small - wrist circumference from 3.5 - 5.5 inches
Medium - wrist circumference from 5.5 - 6.5 inches
Large - wrist circumference 6.5 - 7.5 inches
X-Large - wrist circumference - 7.5 + inches

If you would like any more information, please contact me by email at andrea@energeticlove.ca

name: Flappin' Felted Cuff
description:
This cuff is fun and whimsical with it's 50's flapper button, and can be done in a variation of colours.

The base of this particular cuff is a soft and supple medium brown natural merino wool. The top colouring is done in hand dyed purple corredale wool with a white soy silk fibre accent. The button is an image of a flapper, adding a whole lot of fun to a simple pattern. Button and button hole have been hand stitched with purple thread and some good old fashioned love.

This cuff is perfectly cozy on a chilly day, and perfectly cool on a warm one. The wool is not itchy and is surprisingly soft.

As I said this cuff can be done with a variation of accent colours, all you need to do is let me know your favourite upon check out. I will contact you of a sample of your colour choice before I get to work on your cuff. 

If you love the purple, then no need to let me know, I will assume it is your favourite too!

Sizing is as follows:

Small - wrist circumference from 3.5 - 5.5 inches
Medium - wrist circumference from 5.5 - 6.5 inches
Large - wrist circumference 6.5 - 7.5 inches
X-Large - wrist circumference - 7.5 + inches

If you would like any more information, please contact me by email at andrea@energeticlove.ca
